pr_title: Fix string comparison in C++ UE4 client generator

timeline.message: fix string comparison in cpp ue4 generator

timeline.bodyText: Has something else changed? These default clauses are needed if I remember correctly.
timeline.author: Kahncode

replies.bodyText:
Yes, there was a fix. Previously the first response code is considered the default, which is incorrect as default should be defined separately.
Shall we revise the code to throw an exception instead as the response code is not defined in the spec?
replies.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: No, this code does not support exceptions. Essentially if the response code was undefined in the spec I assumed it was a correct response. You may change that default behavior but I believe my tests ended up concluding that this was the best case scenario.
replies.author: Kahncode

replies.bodyText: What about logging an error message instead?
replies.author: wing328

replies.bodyText:
I think I'll merge this PR which aims to fix the string comparison.
The issue (default case has gone) is present in the generator regardless of this PR.
replies.author: wing328
